original_text: Then the three mighty men broke through the camp of the Philistines and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem that was by the gate and carried and brought it to David. But he would not drink of it. He poured it out to the Lord
korean_text: 세 용사가 블레셋 사람의 진영을 돌파하고 지나가서 베들레헴 성문 곁 우물 물을 길어 가지고 다윗에게로 왔으나 다윗이 마시기를 기뻐하지 아니하고 그 물을 여호와께 부어 드리며

sentences.original_text: Then the three mighty men broke through the camp of the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 용사 세 사람은 블레셋 진영을 뚫었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 베들레헴 우물에서 물을 길어 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: and carried and brought it to David.
But he would not drink of it.
He poured it out to the Lord
